category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: User.is_out_of_office.FORMATSTRING
preference.preference_description: Defines the property formatter for the "is_out_of_office" boolean property on User business object. Using this property formatter, the boolean property is displayed as the localized values of the keys "k_yes" for "True" and "k_no" for "False".
